column4: i just installed Ubuntu 8.04 and did a upgrade to 8.10 on a Asus A6 series laptop, everthing worked as it should but when i rebooted and got to the log-in screen both the mouse and keyboard are unresponsive.
blame the developers for the early adoption of xorg 1.5. are you on ati by any chance?
I Dont knoe what grapic card it has, mouse/keyb worked fine in 8.04
lspci | grep VGA
hang on.
the card is ATI Radeon Xpress 200M
good luck with the opensource radeon drivers then
i have a radeon on this laptop it works great !
but the keyboard and mouse does not work
on this laptop they do
wait. is the problem with the mouse and keyboard on the same pc as the ati?
both laptops have ati radeon cards, one works the other does not
ask then "how do i configure my mouse and keyboard on the new xorg?"
i dont know, i am on xorg 1.4 still for that reason. ask the rest
/etc/X11/xorg.conf
i dont have a X11 dir !
then its the new xorg 1.5 novelties
what for?
i cant get the mouse/kb to work on 8.10, it did work in 8.10
can i show you my xorg.conf in case you get any ideas?
as a last resort
sure
http://7g.pri.ee/mine.conf
